item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery is an ‘attractive’ takeover candidate that could have a surprising buyer, says Wells Fargo

item.title: Crypto stocks have outperformed bitcoin since April. Wolfe Research likes these names
item.description: Bitcoin has been trading sideways in recent weeks as other crypto ecosystems such as Ethereum and Solana take their turns in the spotlight.
